en.text:
Almost all users are real humans but one may try to cheat creating userbots to win referral competition or to earn more tokens. Captcha protects our airdrop by preventing malicious bots, multiple-entries and spam.
#USER, We know you're a humain, bots don't like cookies. Captcha is a protocol ğŸ˜‡.
Users get 3 tries and 2 chances to refresh the captcha. Captcha must be verified within 10 mins. Failing to do so would result in ban. These parameters are also customizable.
